name: B. A Balanced Problemset
statement:
Jay managed to create a problem of difficulty x and decided to make it
the second problem for Codeforces Round 921. But Yash fears that this
problem will make the contest highly unbalanced, and the coordinator
will reject it. So, he decided to break it up into a problemset of n
sub-problems such that the difficulties of all the sub-problems are a
positive integer and their sum is equal to x. The coordinator, Aleksey,
defines the balance of a problemset as the GCD of the difficulties of
all sub-problems in the problemset. Find the maximum balance that Yash
can achieve if he chooses the difficulties of the sub-problems
optimally.
